price: (21) And when the Qur’ān is recited to them, they do not prostrate [to Allāh]?
arabic: وَإِذَا قُرِئَ عَلَيۡهِمُ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانُ لَا يَسۡجُدُونَۤ۩

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā quri-a ʿalayhimu al-qur'ānu lā yasjudūna
